comment:
How'd the 1oz juniper berries turn out?  
I'm planning to soak some juniper berries in vodka and I read from a post: http://www.homebrewtalk.com/showthread.php?t=278226 on homebrewtalk by pjj2ba that, "Started at 2 oz - too much! 1 oz was pretty good, but still a little too strong. I'm thinking about 0.5 oz this year."
